definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The second largest habitat was designed to copy the natural environment of beluga whales.
sentences.chinese: 第二大棲息地是摹仿白鯨的自然生活環境而設計的。

sentences.english: House: Only an idiot gets between Ahab and his whale.
sentences.chinese: 唯有傻子纔會橫在亞哈和白鯨之間。

sentences.english: This is my first time to be so close to a white whale.
sentences.chinese: 頭一次和白鯨有這麼近距離的接觸。

sentences.english: Melville incorporated in "Moby Dick" an exhaustive encyclopaedia of whaling lore .
sentences.chinese: 梅爾維爾在《白鯨》中彙集了各種捕鯨知識。

sentences.english: Twitter users are very familiar with the iconic image of the Fail Whale.
sentences.chinese: Twitter的使用者非常熟悉這個失能白鯨圖像。

sentences.english: Belugas have 40 small conical teeth which they use to grasp fish.
sentences.chinese: 白鯨有40個用來抓魚圓錐形小牙齒。

sentences.english: This is the story of the Fail Whale.
sentences.chinese: 這是關於失能白鯨的故事。

sentences.english: A diver is swimming with two white whales under icebergs in the White Sea, Russia.
sentences.chinese: 一個潛水員正與兩條白鯨在俄羅斯的冰山下游泳。

sentences.english: Divers often play with white whales who seem to show off.
sentences.chinese: 潛水員常常炫耀與白鯨玩。

sentences.english: From many zoo- and water parks white whales are brought here to be released.
sentences.chinese: 從許多動物園和水上樂園的白鯨被帶到這裏釋放。

sentences.english: This “nature farm” serves as a breeding center and a center of rehabilitation for white whales.
sentences.chinese: 這個“自然的農場”作爲白鯨的繁育和康復中心。

sentences.english: White whales are not endangered yet but still they are threatened by pollution and habitat reduction.
sentences.chinese: 白鯨沒有瀕臨滅絕，但是他們的棲息地受到污染減少。

sentences.english: That's real Beluga caviar in the first class dining room sequence.
sentences.chinese: 在頭等艙餐桌上的魚子醬是真正的白鯨魚子醬。

sentences.english: The whale nearest to the photographer is releasing air to aid its descent.
sentences.chinese: 這隻離攝影師最近的白鯨正呼出空氣以幫助其下潛。

definition: SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
(bird species of China) Eurasian skylark (Alauda arvensis)
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]
